Withdrawal from different substances may 
present with different symptoms: 
• Alcohol: Tremor, gastrointestinal
problems
• Nicotine (cigarettes): Irritability,
restl essness,  anxiety, insomnia,
fatigue, poor concentration
• Cannabis: Irritability, anxiety,
insomnia, lack of appetite
• Cocaine: Crash phase: fatigue,
increased appetite
• Cocaine withdrawal phase:
Irritability, insomnia, strong
c
ravings, sadness
• Methamphetamine (‘Tik’): Crash
phas
